EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1333129164.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1333129164.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Robert, I will be happy to remove this information, before I do; I want to make sure we are on the same page. I know Bruce (copied above) was going to reach out to you to discuss this process. If there is any information you are uncomfortable providing please put “N/A” and we will do the best with the information you provide. If you would like MBO to sign and NDA please let me know and I will arrange that. Independent Contractor compliance requires that you maintain independence in three primary areas: Behavioral Control, Financial Control, and Type of Relationship (see the IRS rules http://www.irs.gov/taxtopics/tc762.html). The purpose of our vender registration process is to evaluate risks, if any, with paying your company directly. If you are not planning on moving forward please confirm and I will remove your information from our system. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Robert Mackay [mailto:r.mackay@mactutor.net] Sent: Thursday, March 29, 2012 2:43 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Sara, Please remove all information submitted into your system by our company. I was not aware of the terms and conditions of the agreement and do not wish to pursue any business relationship between our organizations at this time. The account created was under "mactutor". Please send confirmation when the information has been deleted from your system Thank You,Robert MacKay PresidentMacTutor, Inc.r.mackay@mactutor.net <mailto:r.mackay@mactutor.net>FileMaker 11, 10, 9, 8 Certified DeveloperFileMaker 11, 10 Authorized Trainerph 727 230-1439fax 727 230-1942 The MacTutor Team “Even in These Tough Economic Times, FileMaker Tools Assist Your Expansion” See who our Clients are http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/our_clients.html <http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/our_clients.html>
Find out more about our Authorized Training Classes in Florida http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training.html <http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training.html>
Read some success stories http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training_testimonials.html <http://www.mactutor.net/filemaker/training_testimonials.html>
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s). It is covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act, 18 U.S.C. § 2510-2521 and is legally privileged. It may also contain information protected by the vender-client privilege. Unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient and have received this communication in error, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy and delete all copies of the original message. THANK YOU! On Mar 29, 2012, at 2:14 PM, sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear Robert, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking here <https://app1.mbopartners.com/web/join/link?display=PersonalInfo_C2C&ec=MBOMBC&reset=true&cd=10A4A53B001FCFF60F50C0>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns.
We look forward to working with you. Regards, Sara CondeEnrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6028 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. </html
